text: Beresford is a city in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. Most of the city is located in Union County, but a small part of it is in Lincoln County. Beresford became a city in 1884, and 2,180 people lived there at the 2020 census. The town has a very kind community with small businesses and and a separated elementary and high school, which has been changed in some time. Beresford also has a 5 star library with many books to choose from. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Beresford website Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1884 establishments in Dakota Territory
title: Beresford, South Dakota
